choices.description: Play a villain and hero again

then.to: shuffle and deal back to all players

choices.description: Destroy a card in your Discard Pile
Move villain from your Discard Pile to the top of your Deck.

effects.to: put on top of your deck

choices.description: Move villain with cost <= 7 from your Discard Pile to your Hand.
Destroy 2 cards in your Hand and +5 Power
Gain Hero or Villain from the Line Up

effects.to: put on top of your deck

choices.description: Destroy a card in your Hand or Discard Pile
Put up to 2 cards from your discard pile into your hand.
Put all cards of one type with cost of 3 or less from your discard pile into your hand.

playEffects.to: put on top of your deck

choices.description: Destroy a card in your Discard Pile, +3 Power
Gain up to 5 cost of cards from the Line Up and put them into your hand
Play each Hero and Villain in the Line Up
Gain all Equipment from the Line-Up and put them in your hand.
Gain an equipment from the Line Up and put it into your hand
Destroy a card in your hand, +2 Power

then.to: destroy and gain power equal to its cost

choices.description: Move a Hero from your Discard Pile to the top of your Deck.

effects.to: put on top of your deck

choices.description: Move a Hero from your Discard Pile to your Hand.
Replace a card in the line up
Destroy a card in your hand

otherwise.to: put on top of your deck

choices.description: Put a Kick into your hand.

playEffects.to: destroy and replace in the line-up
put on top of your deck

choices.description: Add Activation: Pay 3 Power to Gain Top Card of the Main Deck

then.to: put in your hand. The other will go on bottom of the main deck

leftoverCardEffects.to: put on top of the main deck
